name: Quanticube
description:
INFO

You are in a station, in the middle of space with a quantum entanglement gun.

The only thing you know is that you want to escape...

Quanticube is a puzzle game about you being stuck in a space ship and trying to get out using your special "linking" gun. This tool allows you to join objects together, making them share physical properties like motion. You need to cleverly use it to clean your way out.

NOOBS GUIDE

- Use WASD or arrow keys to move your character.

- Moving into a cube will push it.

- Left click will shoot a laser that after hitting a box will mark it with purple particles.

- Right click will shoot a laser that unmarks a box.

- When two cubes with same color (or with mixed color) are marked, they will move the same if one of them is pushed.

- To open doors you have to put box with matching color on the button.

- Black boxes cant be moved.
